title: What time is the 2015 World Championship?
body:
Do we know what time the 2015 World Championship will be happening in Berlin on Oct. 31st?  I am trying to set up a viewing party at a local restaurant, but there appears to be no information whatsoever as to what time the event will be roughly happening.

Thanks!

replies.body: [2015 Worlds - Finals](http://na.lolesports.com/articles/2015-world-championship-finals-tickets) begins at 12:00 PM CET on October 31.
